curseprofile_description: A modular, multi-featured user profile system.
exception-nologinreturn-text: Please [{{fullurl:Special:UserLogin|returnto=$1}} log in] to be able to access this page or action.
friendrequestconfirm-prompt: Would you like to confirm the friend request from $1?
friendrequestignore-prompt: Would you like to ingore the friend request from  $1?
friendrequestremove-prompt: Would you like to remove $1 from your friends?
friendrequestsend-error: There was an error sending your request
friendrequestconfirm-error: There was an error confirming the request
friendrequestignore-error: There was an error ignoring request
friendrequestremove-error: There was an error while trying to remove a friend
friendrequest-direct-notfound: A user by that name could not be found
friendrequest-direct-unmerged: This user cannot be added as a friend because they have not merged their Curse account
report-thanks: Thanks for letting us know. The comment will be reviewed by moderator soon.
comment-invaliduser: Could not find a user for the given id.
emptyactivity: This user hasn't made any edits on this wiki yet
tooltip-ca-switch_type: Switch between profile and wiki page
aboutmehelp-blocked: You cannot edit your profile at this time.
repliestooltip: View replies or add one of your own
remove-prompt: You are about to delete the comment by $1
purgeaboutme-prompt: You are about to empty the 'about me' section of this profile
purge-prompt: You are about to permanently destroy the comment by $1
report-prompt: You are about to report the comment by $1 for inappropriate content
profilepref-profile: Use an enhanced Curse Profile user page
profilepref-wiki: Use a standard wiki user page
avatar-help: Gamepedia uses Gravatar to display an avatar based on your email address. Visit [http://www.gravatar.com/ gravatar.com] to change your avatar.
profilelink-help: The above profile links must exactly match the example format to be displayed.
commentboard-empty: There are no comments on this user's board.
commentboard-invalid: Sorry, no comment exists for this link.
friendsboard-invalid: Sorry, that user was not found.
echo-pref-tooltip-profile-comment: Notify me when someone leaves a comment on my profile.
notification-profile-comment: [[{{ns:User}}:$1]] has left a comment on [[{{ns:User}}:$2|your profile]].
notification-profile-comment-email-subj: $1 has left a comment on your Gamepedia profile!
notification-profile-comment-email-body: $1 has left a comment on your profile on {{SITENAME}}. You can read and reply to them here: {{canonicalurl:{{#special:CommentPermalink}}/$3}}
notification-profile-comment-email-bundl: $1 and $3 {{PLURAL:$4|other|others}} have left a comment on your profile on {{SITENAME}}. You can read and reply by viewing your profile: {{canonicalurl:{{ns:User}}:$2}}
echo-pref-tooltip-friendship: Notify me when someone sends me a friend request.
notification-friendship-request: [[User:$1]] has added you as a friend.
notification-friendship-request-email-su: $1 has added you as a friend on Gamepedia!
notification-friendship-request-email-bo: $1 has added you as a friend on Gamepedia. You may manage your friend requests here: {{canonicalurl:{{#special:ManageFriends}}}}
notification-friendship-request-email-bu: $1 and $2 {{PLURAL:$3|other|others}} have added you as a friend on Gamepedia. You may manage your friend requests here: {{canonicalurl:{{#special:ManageFriends}}}}
gamepedia-email-footer-default:
Thanks,
Your friendly Gamepedia notification system
$2
Control which emails you receive by changing your email preferences at:
{{canonicalurl:{{#special:Preferences}}#mw-prefsection-echo}}
$1
profilestats-avgFriends: Users with at least 1 friend avg $1 friends.
commentmoderation-empty: There are no comments in the moderation queue.
empty_about_text: Your information about yourself is blank, click to edit.
curseprofile_log_description: This is the log of Curse Profile comments that have been created/edited.
